translation.en: Look! Super Space Squad action figures!
translation.it: Le action figure della Super Squadra Spaziale.

translation.en: I'd love to tell you, but... ♪ It's a surprise! ♪
translation.it: Vorrei dirvelo, ma… è una sorpresa.

translation.en: The Haberdashery Department is where you buy fabric
translation.it: Nel reparto merceria si comprano stoffe

translation.en: but we're not stopping here, Chip Dip!
Better hoodie up before she sees you, slidey mouse.
I'm going to make it into a new jacket for my next music concert.
translation.it: Mi cucirò una giacca per il mio prossimo concerto.

translation.en: Wow, you can play piano and make clothes!
translation.it: Sai suonare il piano e cucire?

translation.en: Oh, lovely to see you, Corella, but we need to keep moving, puggy pups!
translation.it: Che piacere, Corella, ma dobbiamo andare, cuccioli!

translation.en: [P.A. dings] Good morning, Happyton shoppers! Welcome to the Woofy Wedding Department.
translation.it: Buongiorno, acquirenti. Benvenuti al Reparto Matrimoni.

translation.en: We've got every possible outfit for your doggy big day!
translation.it: Abbiamo ogni abito per il vostro giorno speciale.

translation.en: Is this where we're stopping, Momma? [older voice] It sure is, Pugsters!
translation.it: - Dobbiamo fare acquisti qui, mamma? - Proprio così.

translation.en: Is this the dress you're going to wear when you marry Gordie?
translation.it: Indosserai questo vestito quando ti sposerai con Gordie?

translation.en: It's not quite my style, Chipadoodle, but I have chosen my wedding outfit!
translation.it: Non è il mio stile, Chippolina, ma ho scelto il mio abito.

translation.en: -[gasps] -Can we see it, Grandma? Puggy pleasey?
All three of you grandpups will have to wait till the wedding day.
translation.it: Voi tre nipoti aspetterete il giorno del matrimonio.

translation.en: I have a surprise for each of you.
translation.it: Ho una sorpresa per tutti e tre.

translation.en: I would like you all to be bridespups at my wedding to Gordie!
translation.it: Vorrei che mi faceste da carlini d'onore al matrimonio!

translation.en: Um, Grandma? What is a bridespup?
I've been a bridespup twice already!
translation.it: Ho fatto la carlina d'onore due volte.

translation.en: Bridespups do really important jobs at weddings.
Bridespups enter the wedding first to let everyone know that the bride and groom are coming.
translation.it: Entrano prima per annunciare l'arrivo degli sposi.

translation.en: And today, bridespups, you can choose what to wear at the wedding!
translation.it: E oggi potete scegliere cosa indossare al matrimonio.

translation.en: You mean I get to choose my wedding outfit all by myself?
translation.it: Posso scegliere cosa mettere da sola?

translation.en: I want to wear a pretty dress!
I think I'd look cool wearing a jacket.
Can I wear a jumpsuit, Grandma?
but I'd like you all to choose outfits that are the same color.
translation.it: ma vorrei che sceglieste abiti dello stesso colore.

translation.en: Then, on the day, everyone will know that you are my special bridespups.
translation.it: Così quel giorno sapranno tutti che siete i miei carlini d'onore.

translation.en: We can all choose the same color to wear, Grandma, no puggy problem!
translation.it: Possiamo scegliere tutti lo stesso colore. Nessun problema.

translation.en: So, are you all happy wearing green, bridespups?
but the color is so fabby-waggy-doodah!
Don't worry, there are plenty of other colors to choose from.
translation.it: Tranquilla. Ci sono tanti altri colori.

translation.en: [in unison] No way! No way! No way!
Oh, Potato, we can't all agree on a color for our bridespups' outfits.
translation.it: Potato, non riusciamo a metterci d'accordo.

translation.en: Choosing what to wear to Grandma's wedding is much harder than I thought it would be.
translation.it: Scegliere cosa indossare è più difficile del previsto.

translation.en: I wish we could find a color we all like.
translation.it: Vorrei trovare un colore per tutti.

translation.en: You can't wander off by yourself in a department store.
translation.it: Non puoi andare in giro da sola.

translation.en: No, Spud! I am not wearing red!
translation.it: No, Spud. Non voglio vestirmi di rosso.

translation.en: Well, I'm not wearing green! That's the color our rival soccer team wears.
translation.it: Beh, e io di verde. È il colore della squadra rivale.

translation.en: Now, listen, pups, I know this is a really hard choice...
translation.it: Ascoltate. So che è una scelta difficile.

translation.en: So I think it would be better if Grandma chooses what color you wear.
translation.it: Quindi credo sia meglio far scegliere alla nonna.

translation.en: I'll have a think, and we can come back another day.
translation.it: Ci penserò su, e torneremo un altro giorno.

translation.en: Oh, Grandma, I'm sorry we couldn't agree on a color
translation.it: Oh, nonna. Mi dispiace se non siamo riusciti a metterci d'accordo.
Mi dispiace se non siamo riusciti a metterci d'accordo.

translation.en: Oh, my Chipadoodle, please don't worry.
You know you'll have to put that truck back in the toy department before we go.
translation.it: Dovrai rimettere a posto la macchinina prima di andare.

translation.en: You think maybe there's a color on here that we haven't tried yet?
translation.it: Credi ci sia un colore che non abbiamo trovato?

translation.en: That's a big idea for a little mouse.
translation.it: È un'idea grandiosa per una topina.

translation.en: [Spud] Sorry, Chipolata, but we've already tried all these colors.
translation.it: Chippolina, abbiamo già provato questi colori.
- Mi piace… - Il rosso. Lo sappiamo.

translation.en: I like green, and Chip likes yellow.
translation.it: A me piace il verde e a Chip il giallo.

translation.en: They look great all smooshed together in a rainbow.
translation.it: Sono belli tutti insieme in un arcobaleno.

translation.en: Your bridespups can still do this together.
translation.it: I tuoi carlini d'onore possono farcela.

translation.en: Wanna help look for rainbow-colored outfits, Potato?
translation.it: Ci aiuti a cercare abiti arcobaleno, Potato?

translation.en: You might be able to spot a rainbow-colored outfit from up there?
translation.it: Potresti vedere un abito arcobaleno da lassù.

translation.en: Potato, remember you slid down the rainbow fabric
translation.it: Potato, sei scivolata sulla stoffa arcobaleno

translation.en: just before we saw Corella? Uh-huh.
Momma, please can we bridespups go to the ha-ba-dashery section?
Why do you want to go there, Chippy Dip?
Can Grandma and I come too? Yes, yes!
translation.it: - Possiamo venire io e Nonna? - Sì!

translation.en: [giggles] You are full of surprises, Chip!
I promise I won't look until you tell me I can.
translation.it: Prometto che guarderò solo quando me lo dirai tu.

translation.en: Rainbow-colored fabric for your bridespup outfits?
translation.it: Tessuto arcobaleno per i vostri abiti?

translation.en: And we know who can sew them...
I nearly got a ride all the way to the toy department!
translation.it: Stavo per finire al reparto giocattoli.

translation.en: Thanks for your help today, Potato. -[beeping horn] -[giggling]
Do you think you can take the truck back to the toy section all by yourself?
translation.it: Puoi riportare la macchinina al reparto giocattoli da sola?

translation.en: Huh? This store has a wonderful café,
and I am not leaving until I've treated you all to an apple muffin.
translation.it: e non posso andarmene senza prima offrirvi un dolcetto.

translation.en: My way of saying thank you
for finding the perfect colors to wear to my wedding.
translation.it: per aver trovato i colori perfetti per il mio matrimonio.

translation.en: I drew this for you with my new pens.
Hoodie up now we're in class, Potato.
Puggy Panda Potato best friends forever!
translation.it: Migliori amici panda pucciosi per sempre.

translation.en: It's... here at last, Happy Hoppers!
Everyone gather on the carpet, please!
You don't want to miss out on Fun Day fun?
You can stay secret in my pocket today.
Now we're all here... let the fun begin!
translation.it: Ora che siamo qui. Che il divertimento abbia inizio!

translation.en: The bubbles are not for eating, Howie.
translation.it: - Non si mangiano le bolle, Howie. - Ops.
- Non si mangiano le bolle, Howie. - Ops. Ora mettetevi in coppia.

translation.en: Ah, good morning, Mr. Diggerty. Nice hat.
translation.it: Buon giorno, sig. Talpa. Bel cappello.

translation.en: The gym's all set for fun.

translation.it: - Caspita! - I trampolini! I miei preferiti.

translation.en: We're going to have so much fun, Nico!
Now, Happy Hoppers, before you bounce,
there are three rules that you need to follow.
translation.it: ci sono tre regole da seguire.

translation.en: Rule number two. Bounce in the middle of your own trampoline, not at the edge,
translation.it: Regola numero due, saltate al centro del vostro trampolino.

translation.en: No bouncing unless a grown-up is watching.
translation.it: niente salti senza un adulto a supervisionare.

translation.en: Shoes off! Bounce in the middle!
[together] Shoes off! Bounce in the middle!
Ready to bounce, Happy Hoppers? [all cheering] Yes! Yeah! Whoo-hoo!
translation.it: - Pronti a saltare, Allegri Salterini? - Sì.

translation.en: Careful, Chip, you're too close to the edge!
translation.it: Attenta, Chip. Sei vicina al bordo.

translation.en: [Diggerty] Now, Chip, remember what Ms. Gnash said,
translation.it: Ricorda cosa ha detto la signora Nash.

translation.en: you must bounce in the middle of your own trampoline. It's lucky you landed on Nico's.
translation.it: Devi saltare al centro. Fortunatamente sei finita su Nico.

translation.en: You might have landed on the edge and hurt yourself.
translation.it: Potevi cadere sul bordo e farti male.

translation.en: And my favorite move... a seat drop!
translation.it: Il salto da seduta è la mia mossa preferita.

translation.en: I want to do that, Potato.
I'll get the move right next time.
Trampoline time is over, Happy Hoppers!
Now, a special Fun Day snack time!
I didn't get to do Gigglish's seat drop.
translation.it: Non sono riuscita a saltare come Ridella.
Gli insegnati e io abbiamo preparato degli snack.

translation.en: have made you your very own fun snacks!
translation.it: Gli insegnati e io abbiamo preparato degli snack. Sì!

translation.en: Try my Mrs. Woolly's Wibbly Wobbly Pudding.

translation.it: È la ricetta della mia bisnonna.

translation.en: Sample my Mrs. Whale super seaweed sushi rolls!
translation.it: Degustate il mio Sushi alle Alghe.

translation.en: Fun Day is such a fun day, Chip.
I just wish I could have done a seat drop on the trampoline, Nico.
translation.it: Ma mi sarebbe piaciuto fare un salto seduta, Nico.

translation.en: Then it would be even more fun.
translation.it: E sarebbe stata ancora più divertente.

translation.en: I'll teach you to do a seat drop, Chip! On my trampoline at home!
translation.it: Te lo insegno io. Sul mio trampolino a casa.

translation.en: I will get to do a seat drop after all!
Before our next fun activity, Happy Hoppers, there's just one thing to diggledy do...
translation.it: Prima della prossima attività, Allegri Salterini c'è una cosa da fare.

translation.en: Barry and Gigglish, collect the cups, please, and Peter and Howie, clean the plates.
translation.it: Barry e Ridella prendete i bicchieri. E Peter e Howie, pulite i piatti.

translation.en: Chip and Nico, can you sweep up the crumbs, please?
translation.it: Chip e Nico, potete spazzare le molliche?

translation.en: You'll need to get the dustpan and broom from the storage cupboard.
Uh, Chip? We have to get the dustpan and broom.
But, Nico, if I could have just one more try
translation.it: Ma, Nico, se potessi provare solo un'altra volta

translation.en: at doing Gigglish's seat drop on the trampoline,
translation.it: a fare il salto da seduta di Ridella,

translation.en: I know I could do it!
Chip, Gigglish said she'd teach you on her trampoline after school.
translation.it: Ridella ti ha detto che ti avrebbe insegnato lei.

translation.en: But I really want to do it now,
translation.it: Ridella ti ha detto che ti avrebbe insegnato lei. Ma voglio provarci ora.

translation.en: No, Chip. You know the rule.
You can pretend to be a grown-up and watch me, Nico.
translation.it: Puoi fingere di essere un adulto e guardarmi, Nico.

translation.en: It'll be okay, Potato, I promise.
That's it, Chip. You tried the move. You couldn't do it.
translation.it: Basta, Chip. Ci hai provato. Non ci sei riuscita.

translation.en: What are you doing on the trampolines?
I think it's fine, but you two
translation.it: Bene. Credo stia bene. Ma voi due dovevate prendere la scopa,

translation.en: should have been fetching the dustpan and broom,
translation.it: Ma voi due dovevate prendere la scopa,

translation.en: What was our trampolining rule number three?
translation.it: Qual era la nostra terza regola?

translation.en: So, you knew the rule, but you didn't follow it,
translation.it: Conoscevate la regola e non l'avete rispettata.

translation.en: I have to tell Mr. Diggerty it wasn't Nico's fault.
translation.it: Devo dire al signor Talpa che non è colpa di Nico.

translation.en: Mr. Diggerty, Nico didn't bounce on the trampoline.
translation.it: Sig. Talpa, Nico non è saltato sul trampolino.

translation.en: He only climbed up to help me when I hurt my tail.
translation.it: È solo salito su per aiutare me.

translation.en: But I asked you both to get the dustpan and broom from the storage cupboard,
translation.it: Ma ho chiesto a entrambi di prendere la scopa dal ripostiglio,

translation.en: and you came here to the gym instead.
translation.it: e invece siete venuti in palestra.

translation.en: Therefore, you will help Ms. Gnash finish cleaning up the cafeteria
translation.it: Quindi aiuterete la signora Nash a pulire la mensa

translation.en: while the rest of the Happy Hoppers enjoy the next fun activity of the day.
translation.it: mentre gli altri si godranno la prossima attività.

translation.en: My super Fun Day obstacle course!
translation.it: La mia super corsa a ostacoli!

translation.en: Watching the others have fun isn't much fun, Potato. [Potato] Aw...
translation.it: Guardare gli altri che si divertono non è divertente.

translation.en: This is all your fault, Chip.
You wanted to do Gigglish's seat drop, and you got us both into trouble.
translation.it: Volevi fare il salto di Ridella e ci hai messo nei guai.

translation.en: Not eating your cake, Chip Dip?
Oh, Momma, Nico drew this picture just for me,
translation.it: Mamma, Nico mi ha disegnato questo,

translation.en: but now I don't know if he's my best friend anymore.
translation.it: ma ora non so se è ancora il mio migliore amico.

translation.en: I'm sure he's still your friend, Chip, but he's probably upset.
translation.it: Sono sicura di sì, Chip, ma sarà arrabbiato.

translation.en: You broke a rule and got him into trouble.
translation.it: Hai infranto una regola e l'hai messo nei guai.

translation.en: It's so unlike you to break a rule, Chip.
translation.it: Non è da te infrangere le regole.

translation.en: Maybe tomorrow I could take you over to Nico's
translation.it: Forse domani posso portarti da Nico

translation.en: so you could say sorry again and make up.
translation.it: per scusarti di nuovo e fare la pace.

translation.en: Can I give Nico my cake to say a proper puggy sorry?
translation.it: Posso dare a Nico la mia torta per scusarmi?

translation.en: That's a great idea, Chip. Do you want me to come with you?
translation.it: Ottima idea, Chip. Vuoi che venga con te?

translation.en: I think I want to talk to Nico on my own.
translation.it: Voglio parlare con Nico da sola.

translation.en: I hope Nico wants to speak to me.
translation.it: Spero che Nico voglia parlare con me.

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, Chip Pug, Nico went to bed early.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, Chip. È andato a letto presto.

translation.en: He was tired after all the bouncing, and the cleaning,
translation.it: Era stanco dopo tutti i salti e le pulizie.

translation.en: and Nico has a big day tomorrow. His daddy is coming to visit.
translation.it: E domani viene il suo papà.

translation.en: I-- I brought him sorry cake.
translation.it: Gli ho portato una torta di scuse.
Volevo dire… una torta di zucca.

translation.en: Thank you, Chip. I'll make sure he gets it.
In the morning, Momma, I'm gonna go to Nico's house again
translation.it: Di mattina, andrò di nuovo da Nico

translation.en: to talk to him and make up.
and in the meantime, you get a good night's sleep.
Do you think Nico and I will ever be best friends again, Potato?
translation.it: Credi che io e Nico saremo di nuovo migliori amici, Potato?

translation.en: Thanks for trying to cheer me up, Potato,
translation.it: Grazie volermi tirare su il morale, Potato,

translation.en: but I don't want to do trampolining again for a while.
I just want to make up with Nico. Will you help me do that tomorrow?
translation.it: Voglio solo fare la pace con Nico. Mi aiuterai domani?

translation.en: You're the best snuggly mouse in the whole world.
translation.it: Sei la migliore topina del mondo.
